issue.title: Table is moving over time, cordless drill dancing in qualification task 2 scenario

content.raw: @nkoenig the solution to this ticket is simple but prevents teams that don't know how to fix it / whether it's intended to be that unstable from training properly for the qualifier (and well, it needs to be fixed for quals ...).
content.html: @nkoenig the solution to this ticket is simple but prevents teams that don't know how to fix it / whether it's intended to be that unstable from training properly for the qualifier (and well, it needs to be fixed for quals ...).
